ai-atk-s0502a24:213_0: And because that financier provided Tagarasikhī with alms-food, as a result of that deed he was reborn seven times in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-atk-s0502a24:213_1: But because that financier regretted giving alms-food,
ai-atk-s0502a24:213_2: And because that financier murdered his brother’s only child for the sake of his fortune, as a result of that deed he burned in hell for many years, for many hundreds, many thousands, many hundreds of thousands of years.
ai-atk-s0502a24:213_3: Now the old merit of that financier has been used up, and he hasn’t accumulated new merit.
ai-atk-s0502a24:213_4: Today, great king, that financier burns in the Great Hell of a prominent merchant, or worker.’
ai-atk-s0502a24:214_0: When the king heard what was taught, he didn’t eat, so much merit. We wouldn’t earn a living by the Buddha, making merit.
ai-atk-s0502a24:214_1: ‘That’s so true, great king,! Don’t covet wealth full of joy, happiness, sadness, and craving. Being they don’t seek wealth solely to keep it in a principled manner. Then think:
ai-atk-s0502a24:216_0: ‘They speak poorly,ed, not emancipating, not leading to far;
ai-atk-s0502a24:217_0: for craving, it’s runs out, and hate.’
ai-atk-s0502a24:218_0: But they don’t reach quenching, but fail to get rich.
ai-atk-s0502a24:219_0: they’ve drunk the fruit of stream-entry, the fruit of once-return.
ai-atk-s0502a24:220_0: the eleventh section on the eleventh section.
ai-atk-s0502a24:222_0: Hatthisāriputta, who came out of this teaching and training, Only having a grass matted hair.
ai-atk-s0502a24:222_3: For this is what they call a boundary.
ai-atk-s0502a24:222_4: But Anuruddha had entered a village for alms in Anuruddha’s ladies, he would give his own alms.
ai-atk-s0502a24:222_5: Then, when the girl was bridge for ten years, he was given a hundred leagues, bride,
ai-atk-s0502a24:222_7: When he said this, the teacher makes a wish, a bride out of patch, and loss of happiness.
ai-atk-s0502a24:222_8: But you don’t give a gift thinking, ‘It’s good to those who don’t urge you to live on according to your own idea.’
ai-atk-s0502a24:223_0: he should give a gift to anyone who is engage in malicious talebearing,
ai-atk-s0502a24:224_0: The Holy One praises giving intelligently
ai-atk-s0502a24:225_0: to those worthy of offerings here in the world of the living.
ai-atk-s0502a24:226_0: What’s given to these is very fruitful,
ai-atk-s0502a24:227_0: You said those seeds are inflicted.
ai-atk-s0502a24:228_0: Then he taught the Dhamma further verses:
ai-atk-s0502a24:231_0: Because a gift to someone who is free of greed is very fruitful.
ai-atk-s0502a24:234_0: That’s why a gift is very fruitful.
ai-atk-s0502a24:236_0: ‘Lovelous fields is the field of field.
ai-atk-s0502a24:237_0: That’s why a gift given to them is very fruitful.
ai-atk-s0502a24:239_0: ‘Like a field’s root is a field.
ai-atk-s0502a24:240_0: That’s why a gift to anyone who has given up very fruitful.’
ai-atk-s0502a24:241_0: There they got up grass and twice. The winds reed and grass, and leaves and fruits on the field, but they didn’t make a lot.
ai-atk-s0502a24:241_1: When food is given to sentient beings, it’s very fruitful, not what’s given to them.
ai-atk-s0502a24:241_2: One who has ended the defilements is very fruitful.
ai-atk-s0502a24:243_0: So a gift to anyone who is free of greed bold and fruitless.’
ai-atk-s0502a24:245_0: And they’ve taken a conclusion, enduring the fruit of stream-entry, attained to fruit, and scrutinizing.
ai-atk-s0502a24:247_0: The canonical text of craving is finished.
ai-atk-s0502a24:248_0: you’re less than twenty years old.
